channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: Belvedere rejects most critiques in grand jury’s housing review
item.description: Belvedere officials are pushing back against a Marin civil grand jury report that criticizes local jurisdictions for failing to meet...
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Richardson Bay agency halts housing-voucher program amid federal funding cuts
item.description: Richardson Bay’s few remaining anchor-outs may have lost their chance at subsidized onshore housing after the agency that manages the bay...
item.dc:creator: Gretchen Lang

item.title: Tiburon fire officials adopt $16.7-million budget with funds for construction, upgrades
item.description: Board adopts spending plan as construction begins on Paradise Drive fire station replacement.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Everyday Encounters: A friendship is built on medical jobs, life in Marin
item.description: Medical professionals from New Hampshire and Southern California discover friendship in Marin.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Artists convey emotions, thoughts in latest Belvedere-Tiburon Library exhibit
item.description: 'Interpretations' features abstracts from local and regional artists.

item.title: Belvedere sets strict path to undo historic home designation
item.description: Tax-break loss sparks debate over fairness and preservation.

item.title: Traffic agency, Belvedere back bike-lane removal in Caltrans’ final draft
item.description: Cyclists show school buses skip stops, fit in others, undermining safety claims.
